data.eml:eml: Original data comes from a project which takes or took place as part of the DFG priority program "Exploratories for large-scale and long-term functional biodiversity research". The data is stored together with descriptive metadata, in combination called a dataset, in the project repository (https://www.bexis.uni-jena.de). Species information was extracted from that original dataset. The second paragraph is part of the metadata of the original dataset.</br>Zur Ueberpruefung der Befallsrate von einzelnen Plantago lanceolata-Pflanzen mit Ruesselkäferarten, deren Parasitoiden und weiteren auf dieser Pflanze vorkommenden Arthropoden, wurden auf allen Plots Plantagobluetenkoepfe eingesammelt.
